data.title: Prime Video: Living with a Superstar
data.meta_description: Cameras follow Shah Rukh Khan's every move in India and across the globe. This groundbreaking series surpasses all definitions of lifestyle entertainment and gives uninhibited access to the life of a mega-star for the first time ever.
data.text:
SRK enjoys a relaxed vacation in London, where he can do things that normal people do. He spends time with family and friends away from the glitz of his normal life, playing soccer with his kids, visiting museums and enjoying a peaceful lunch.

From shoots and meetings to parties and dubbing sessions in the dead of night, cameras follow SRK through his chock-a-block day. Behind the glitz and glamour is a man who is trying to conquer time so he can please all those who want a piece of him.

SRK gives his take on the ups and downs of the Kolkata Knight Riders as they put up a poor showing in South Africa. After a washed-out performance in their second season, he has a game plan to revive the team and rise up from their crushing defeat.

SRK isn't just an actor. He's also a businessman with endorsements, a production house and a kingdom to manage. A look at the world of SRK Inc. follows him as he shoots commercials, celebrates Diwali with his employees, and dons the hat of producer.

A look behind the scenes of the filming of "My Name Is Khan" showcases the brilliance and intensity of a superstar at work. As the shoot moves from San Francisco to Mumbai, SRK embraces different styles of work when shooting at home and abroad.

Sometimes work requires that Shah Rukh Khan must hit the road, live out of a suitcase and make a hotel room his home. He navigates his way through film shoots, appearances and other events while keeping up his supercharged lifestyle.

SRK takes the audience on a tour of his home in Mumbai. Within those walls, he works and plays with the people who form the backbone of his day-to-day life. He also grants access to his house in Dubai, as he steals a weekend away from his busy schedule.

Behind every successful movie star, there is a team. Team SRK is a bunch of people who work behind the scenes, day after day and night after night, to make the superstar's life run like clockwork while he entertains his fans on and off screen.

The superstar delves into what makes him tick, his method, his madness, his magic. Shah Rukh Khan deconstructs the art and technique of acting, as he sees it. He divulges how he approaches a character, internalizes it, lives it and finally lets it go.

The superstar reflects on his concept of a Shah Rukh Khan, Version 2.0. Where does he go from here? What does he want to achieve next? Another film to produce, another product to endorse, another show to make an appearance on? Or is there more?
